RlnOfActyToAccomOfExmptPrpsGrp.RelationshipStatementTxt: THE WASHINGTON COUNTY HOME FOR AGED WOMEN, INC. WAS
CREATED TO HELP PROVIDE CARE FOR THE ELDERLY AND
INDIGENT PEOPLE OF WASHINGTON COUNTY. THE INCOME
RECEIVED FROM INVESTMENTS IS NECESSARY IN ORDER FOR THE CORPORATION TO PROVIDE GRANTS TO OTHER NOT-FOR- PROFIT ORGANIZATIONS WHICH DIRECTLY PROVIDE CARE AND SERVICES TO ELDERLY INDIVIDUALS.
